Puff stitch - Popcorn stitch

Step
Watch video
Slip knot

Trong các hướng dẫn của chart móc thì mũi gút(slip knot) thường không được viết và chúng không tính là mũi đầu tiên.Trong các hướng dẫn của chart móc thì mũi gút(slip knot) thường không được viết và chúng không tính là mũi đầu tiên.
To make a starting loop - fold the yarn to make a loop.
Catch the yarn through the loop.
Pull it through.
Pull the ends to tighten the slipknot. Now put this slipknot on the left hand needle.
Slip stitch
With yarn in back.
Yarn over hook and draw through.
1 slip stitch done. Insert hook into the next st.
Repeat these steps to continue slip stitch.
Chain
With hook behind yarn.
Using left thumb and middle finger.
Draw yarn through loop.
3 sts worked. Continue working the required number of sts (by counting sts made below hook).
Single
Insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Yarn over hook as shown from back to front and draw through loop.
Yarn over hook again and draw through both loops on hook.
1sc (single crochet) done.
Half double
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Yarn over hook and draw through loop as shown.
Yarn over hook again and draw through all three loops on hook.
1hdc (half - double crochet) done.
Double
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Yarn over hook and draw through loop as shown.
Yarn over hook again and draw through two loops on hook.
Yarn over hook once more and draw through remaining two loops on hook.
1dc (double crochet) done.
Triple
Yarn over hook twice and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Yarn over hook and draw through loop.
Yarn over hook and draw through first twoo loops on hook.
Yarn over hook and draw through first two loops on hook two more times.
1tr (triple crochet) done.
Double triple
Wrap yarn around hook three times and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Yarn over hook and draw through loop.
Yarn over hook again and draw through first two loops on hook.
Repeat the previous step three more times.
1dtr (double-triple crochet) done.
hdc3tog into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Work an incomplete hdc. Work 2 more incomplete hdcs into the same st.
Yarn over hook and draw through 7 loops on hook all at once.
This completes as hdc3tog into same stitch.
dc3tog into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Work an incomplete hdc. Work 2 more incomplete hdcs into the same st.
Yarn over hook and draw through 4 loops on hook all at once.
This completes as dc3tog into same stitch.
dc5tog into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Work an incomplete hdc. Work 4 more incomplete hdcs into the same st.
Yarn over hook and draw through 6 loops on hook all at once.
This completes as dc5tog into same stitch.
2sc into same st
Work 1 sc into the top loops of st from the pre row.
Yarn over hook and draw through.
Work 1 more sc into the same st.
2sc worked into same st. 1 st increased.
(1sc-1ch-1sc) into same st
Work 1sc into the top loops of st from the pre row and yarn over hook.
Make 1 chain and then insert hook into the same st.
Draw through and work a sc.
2scs with 1ch worked into same st. 2sts increased.
3sc into same st
Work 1sc into the top loops of st from the pre row.
Work one more sc into the same st.
Work 1 more sc into the same st.
3sc worked into same st. 2 sts increased.
2hdcs into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain st and draw through.
Work 1 hdc. Yarn over hook.
Work 1 more hdc into the same st.
2 hdcs worked into same st. 1 st increased.
3hdcs into same st
Work 1 hdc into the back loops of chain. Yarn over and insert hook into same st.
Work another hdc.
Work 1 more hdc into the same st.
3 hdcs worked into same st. 2 sts increased.
2dcs into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain and draw through.
Work 1 dc. Yarn over hook.
Work 1 more dc into the same st.
2 dcs worked into same st. 1 st increased.
(1dc-1ch-1dc) into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain.
Work 1 dc. Chain 1.
Work 1 more dc into the same st.
2 dcs worked into same st.
3dcs into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain. Yarn over and draw through.
Work 1 dc.
Work 2 more dcs into the same st.
3 dcs worked into same st.
5dcs into same st
Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of chain.
Work 1 dc.
Work 4 more dcs into the same st.
5 dcs worked into same st.
Single crochet 2 stitches together sc2tog
Insert hook into the both loops of the prev row as shown and yarn over hook.
Draw through. Repeat by inserting hook into next st and yarn over hook and draw through.
This makes two incomplete scs. Yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook all at once.
This completes a sc2tog.
Half-double crochet 2 stitches together hdc2tog
Yarn over and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Draw through. Yarn over hook and insert hook into the back loop of the next st and draw through.
This makes two incomplete hdcs. Yarn over and draw through 5 loops on hook all at once.
This completes a hdc2tog.
Double crochet 2 stitches together dc2tog
Insert hook into the back loop of chain st and work 1 incomplete dc. Yarn over hook and insert hook into back loop of the next st and draw through.
Yarn over hook again and draw through first 2 loops on hook.
This makes two incomplete double crochet sts. Yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook at once.
This completes a dc2tog.
Single crochet 3 stitches together sc3tog
Insert hook into the both loops of the prev row as shown.
Repeat the previous step for the next two sts.
This makes three incomplete scs. Yarn over and draw through all 4 loops on hook at once.
This completes a sc3tog.
sc3tog(skipping the center st)
Insert hook into the both loops of the first of three sts.
This makes two incomplete scs. Yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook at once.
This completes a sc3tog.
hdc3tog
Yarn over and insert hook into the back loop of chain st.
Work an incomplete hdc. Work 2 more incomplete hdc in each of the next two sts.
Yarn over hook and draw through all 7 loops on hook at once.
This completes a hdc3tog
dc3tog
Yarn over and insert hook into the back loop of chain st and work an incomplete dc.
Work 2 more incomplete dc in each of the next 2 sts.
Yarn over hook and draw through all 4 loops on hook at once.
This completes a dc3tog
